  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105832</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">I Am Seventeen Going On ... Creating Podcasts to Examine Adolescence Through the Ages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich Bin Siebzehn Gehend Auf... Erstellen von 
von Podcasts, um Adoleszenz durch das Alter zu überprüfen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Je Suis Dix-sept Allant Sur... Créer 
Podcasts pour examiner l'adolescence par les âges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu Sou Dezessete Que Vão Em... Criando 
Podcasts para examinar o adolescence com as idades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sono Diciassette Che Vanno Su... Creazione 
del Podcasts per esaminare adolescenza con le età</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είμαι δεκαεπτά πηγαίνοντας... στη δημιουργία 
Podcasts για να εξετάσω την εφηβεία μέσω των ηλικιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Soy Diecisiete Que van En... Crear Podcasts
para examinar adolescencia con las edades</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students create scripts for podcasts about the relationships between teens and parents in a historical era.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erstellen Kursteilnehmer Indexe 
für podcasts über die Verhältnisse zwischen Teens und Eltern in 
einer historischen Ära.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants créent des 
séquences type pour des podcasts au sujet des rapports entre les 
années de l'adolescence et les parents dans une ère historique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes críam certificados 
para podcasts sobre os relacionamentos entre teens e pais em uma era 
histórica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi creano gli scritti
per i podcasts circa i rapporti fra gli anni dell'adolescenza ed i 
genitori in un'era storica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές δημιουργούν τα 
αρχεία εντολών για τα podcasts για τις σχέσεις μεταξύ των 
teens και των γονέων σε μια ιστορική εποχή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes crean las 
escrituras para los podcasts sobre los lazos entre las adolescencias y
los padres en una era histórica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
